 56namespace vsip
 57{
 58namespace impl
 59{
 60template <typename LHS, typename RHS,
 61	  dimension_type D = LHS::dim,
 62	  typename O = typename Block_layout<LHS>::order_type>
 63struct Loop_fusion_assign;
 64
 65template <typename LHS, typename RHS, typename O>
 66struct Loop_fusion_assign<LHS, RHS, 1, O>
 67{
 68  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
 69  {
 70    expr::evaluate(rhs);
 71
 72    length_type const size = lhs.size(1, 0);
 73    for (index_type i=0; i<size; ++i)
 74      lhs.put(i, rhs.get(i));
 75  }
 76};
 77
 78template <typename LHS, typename RHS>
 79struct Loop_fusion_assign<LHS, RHS, 2, row2_type>
 80{
 81  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
 82  {
 83    expr::evaluate(rhs);
 84
 85    length_type const rows = lhs.size(2, 0);
 86    length_type const cols = lhs.size(2, 1);
 87    for (index_type i=0; i<rows; ++i)
 88      for (index_type j=0; j<cols; ++j)
 89	lhs.put(i, j, rhs.get(i, j));
 90  }
 91};
 92
 93template <typename LHS, typename RHS>
 94struct Loop_fusion_assign<LHS, RHS, 2, col2_type>
 95{
 96  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
 97  {
 98    expr::evaluate(rhs);
 99
100    length_type const rows = lhs.size(2, 0);
101    length_type const cols = lhs.size(2, 1);
102    for (index_type j=0; j<cols; ++j)
103      for (index_type i=0; i<rows; ++i)
104	lhs.put(i, j, rhs.get(i, j));
105  }
106};
107
108template <typename LHS, typename RHS>
109struct Loop_fusion_assign<LHS, RHS, 3, tuple<0,1,2> >
110{
111  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
112  {
113    expr::evaluate(rhs);
114
115    length_type const size0 = lhs.size(3, 0);
116    length_type const size1 = lhs.size(3, 1);
117    length_type const size2 = lhs.size(3, 2);
118
119    for (index_type i=0; i<size0; ++i)
120      for (index_type j=0; j<size1; ++j)
121	for (index_type k=0; k<size2; ++k)
122	  lhs.put(i, j, k, rhs.get(i, j, k));
123  }
124};
125
126template <typename LHS, typename RHS>
127struct Loop_fusion_assign<LHS, RHS, 3, tuple<0,2,1> >
128{
129  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
130  {
131    expr::evaluate(rhs);
132
133    length_type const size0 = lhs.size(3, 0);
134    length_type const size1 = lhs.size(3, 1);
135    length_type const size2 = lhs.size(3, 2);
136
137    for (index_type i=0; i<size0; ++i)
138      for (index_type k=0; k<size2; ++k)
139	for (index_type j=0; j<size1; ++j)
140	  lhs.put(i, j, k, rhs.get(i, j, k));
141  }
142};
143
144template <typename LHS, typename RHS>
145struct Loop_fusion_assign<LHS, RHS, 3, tuple<1,0,2> >
146{
147  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
148  {
149    expr::evaluate(rhs);
150
151    length_type const size0 = lhs.size(3, 0);
152    length_type const size1 = lhs.size(3, 1);
153    length_type const size2 = lhs.size(3, 2);
154
155    for (index_type j=0; j<size1; ++j)
156      for (index_type i=0; i<size0; ++i)
157	for (index_type k=0; k<size2; ++k)
158	  lhs.put(i, j, k, rhs.get(i, j, k));
159  }
160};
161
162template <typename LHS, typename RHS>
163struct Loop_fusion_assign<LHS, RHS, 3, tuple<1,2,0> >
164{
165  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
166  {
167    expr::evaluate(rhs);
168
169    length_type const size0 = lhs.size(3, 0);
170    length_type const size1 = lhs.size(3, 1);
171    length_type const size2 = lhs.size(3, 2);
172
173    for (index_type j=0; j<size1; ++j)
174      for (index_type k=0; k<size2; ++k)
175	for (index_type i=0; i<size0; ++i)
176	  lhs.put(i, j, k, rhs.get(i, j, k));
177  }
178};
179
180template <typename LHS, typename RHS>
181struct Loop_fusion_assign<LHS, RHS, 3, tuple<2,0,1> >
182{
183  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
184  {
185    expr::evaluate(rhs);
186
187    length_type const size0 = lhs.size(3, 0);
188    length_type const size1 = lhs.size(3, 1);
189    length_type const size2 = lhs.size(3, 2);
190
191    for (index_type k=0; k<size2; ++k)
192      for (index_type i=0; i<size0; ++i)
193	for (index_type j=0; j<size1; ++j)
194	  lhs.put(i, j, k, rhs.get(i, j, k));
195  }
196};
197
198template <typename LHS, typename RHS>
199struct Loop_fusion_assign<LHS, RHS, 3, tuple<2,1,0> >
200{
201  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
202  {
203    expr::evaluate(rhs);
204
205    length_type const size0 = lhs.size(3, 0);
206    length_type const size1 = lhs.size(3, 1);
207    length_type const size2 = lhs.size(3, 2);
208
209    for (index_type k=0; k<size2; ++k)
210      for (index_type j=0; j<size1; ++j)
211	for (index_type i=0; i<size0; ++i)
212	  lhs.put(i, j, k, rhs.get(i, j, k));
213  }
214};

218
219namespace vsip_csl
220{
221namespace dispatcher
222{
223/// Copy data using memcpy
224template <typename LHS, typename RHS>
225struct Evaluator<op::assign<1>, be::copy, void(LHS &, RHS const &)>
226{
227  static char const *name() { return "Expr_Copy";}
228
229  typedef typename 
230  impl::Adjust_layout_dim<1, typename impl::Block_layout<LHS>::layout_type>::type
231  lhs_layout_type;
232
233  typedef typename 
234  impl::Adjust_layout_dim<1, typename impl::Block_layout<RHS>::layout_type>::type
235  rhs_layout_type;
236
237  static bool const ct_valid = 
238    LHS::dim == 1 && RHS::dim == 1 &&
239    impl::Ext_data_cost<LHS>::value == 0 &&
240    impl::Ext_data_cost<RHS>::value == 0 &&
241    !impl::Is_split_block<LHS>::value &&
242    !impl::Is_split_block<RHS>::value;
243
244  static bool rt_valid(LHS &, RHS const &) { return true;}
245  
246  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
247  {
248    impl::Ext_data<LHS, lhs_layout_type> ext_lhs(lhs, impl::SYNC_OUT);
249    impl::Ext_data<RHS, rhs_layout_type> ext_rhs(rhs, impl::SYNC_IN);
250
251    typename impl::Ext_data<LHS, lhs_layout_type>::raw_ptr_type ptr1 = ext_lhs.data();
252    typename impl::Ext_data<RHS, rhs_layout_type>::raw_ptr_type ptr2 = ext_rhs.data();
253
254    stride_type stride1 = ext_lhs.stride(0);
255    stride_type stride2 = ext_rhs.stride(0);
256    length_type size    = ext_lhs.size(0);
257    assert(size <= ext_rhs.size(0));
258
259    if (impl::Type_equal<typename LHS::value_type,
260	                 typename RHS::value_type>::value &&
261	stride1 == 1 && stride2 == 1)
262    {
263      memcpy(ptr1, ptr2, size*sizeof(typename LHS::value_type));
264    }
265    else
266    {
267      while (size--)
268      {
269	*ptr1 = *ptr2;
270	ptr1 += stride1;
271	ptr2 += stride2;
272      }
273    }
274  }
275};
276
277/// Simple loop-fusion assignment.
278template <dimension_type D, typename LHS, typename RHS>
279struct Evaluator<op::assign<D>, be::loop_fusion, void(LHS &, RHS const &)>
280{
281  static char const *name() { return "Expr_Loop"; }
282  static bool const ct_valid = true;
283  static bool rt_valid(LHS &, RHS const &) { return true;}
284  
285  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
286  { vsip::impl::Loop_fusion_assign<LHS, RHS, D>::exec(lhs, rhs);}
287};
288
289/// Specialization for (non-elementwise) Unary expressions, using the RBO evaluation.
290template <dimension_type D, typename LHS,
291	  template <typename> class Operation,
292	  typename Block>
293struct Evaluator<op::assign<D>, be::rbo_expr,
294		 void(LHS &, expr::Unary<Operation, Block> const &)>
295{
296  typedef expr::Unary<Operation, Block> RHS;
297  typedef typename LHS::value_type lhs_value_type;
298  typedef typename RHS::value_type rhs_value_type;
299
300  static char const *name() { return "op::rbo_expr";}
301
302  static bool const ct_valid = true;
303  static bool rt_valid(LHS &, RHS const &) { return true;}
304  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs) { rhs.apply(lhs);}
305};
306
307/// Specialization for (non-elementwise) Binary expressions, using the RBO evaluation.
308template <dimension_type D, typename LHS,
309	  template <typename, typename> class Operation,
310	  typename Block1, typename Block2>
311struct Evaluator<op::assign<D>, be::rbo_expr,
312		 void(LHS &, expr::Binary<Operation, Block1, Block2> const &)>
313{
314  typedef expr::Binary<Operation, Block1, Block2> RHS;
315  typedef typename LHS::value_type lhs_value_type;
316  typedef typename RHS::value_type rhs_value_type;
317
318  static char const *name() { return "op::rbo_expr";}
319
320  static bool const ct_valid = true;
321  static bool rt_valid(LHS &, RHS const &) { return true;}
322  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs) { rhs.apply(lhs);}
323};
324
325/// Specialization for (non-elementwise) Ternary expressions, using the RBO evaluation.
326template <dimension_type D, typename LHS,
327	  template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
328	  typename Block1, typename Block2, typename Block3>
329struct Evaluator<op::assign<D>, be::rbo_expr,
330		 void(LHS &, expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3> const &)>
331{
332  typedef expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3> RHS;
333  typedef typename LHS::value_type lhs_value_type;
334  typedef typename RHS::value_type rhs_value_type;
335
336  static char const *name() { return "op::rbo_expr";}
337
338  static bool const ct_valid = true;
339  static bool rt_valid(LHS &, RHS const &) { return true;}
340  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs) { rhs.apply(lhs);}
341};
